title: National Museums (Entry Fees) Regulations, 2016
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 629
Gazette dated Friday, 5th August, 2016
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.59 OF2016
The National Museum Act
(Laws,Volume12,Cap.174)
The National Museums (Entry Fees) Regulations, 2016
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsectionsixoftheNational
MuseumsAct,thefollowingRegulationsaremade:
1. TheseRegulationsmaybecitedastheNationalMuseums Title
(EntryFees)Regulations,2016.
2. The entry fees set out in the Schedule are the applicable Entry fees
feesforentryintothemuseumsspecifiedinthatSchedule
3. TheNationalMuseums(EntryFees)Regulations,1994,are Revocation
revoked. ofS.I.No.
48of1994
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
630 Statutory Instruments 5thAugust,2016
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph2)
ENTRYFEES
Resident Non-Residents
FeeUnits UnitedStatesdollarsor
kwachaequivalent
1. ChomaMuseumandCraftCentre
(a)Adults 50 5
(b)Children 25 3
2. CopperbeltMuseum
(a)Adults 50 5
(b)Children 25 3
3. LivingstoneMuseum
(a)Adults 50 5
(b)Children 25 3
4. LusakaNationalMuseum
(a)Adults 50 5
(b)Children 25 3
5. MotoMotoMusuem
(a)Adults 50 5
(b)Children 25 3
DR. J. KATEMA,
LUSAKA Minister of Chiefs
26thJuly,2016 and Traditional Affairs
[MOCTA.101/1/25]
